movie_title: Bats: Friend or foe? - 6 Minute English
introduction: Improve your English vocabulary and listening in just six minutes! Bats are in the news quite a bit

vocabulary.definition: having a very eager approach to an activity, typically eating
vocabulary.example: The child had a voracious appetite and finished all the food on his plate.

vocabulary.definition: a person or thing from which a person, animal, or plant is descended or originates
vocabulary.example: The ancient tree is considered the progenitor of all the trees in the forest.

vocabulary.definition: something that is extremely difficult to find or achieve, like a sacred goal
vocabulary.example: For him, winning the Nobel Prize was the holy grail of his career.
Hedgehogs are known to be insectivores, feeding on various bugs and worms.

vocabulary.definition: mythical creatures that are believed to feed on the blood of living beings
vocabulary.example: The novel was about a group of vampires living in a small town.

vocabulary.definition: people who actively work to protect the environment from destruction or pollution
vocabulary.example: The environmentalists organized a protest to save the endangered species in the area.
